entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this evening then northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
